text: Bigu: «Ej ahli kitoʙ, ʙijoed ʙa sui suxane, ki mijoni mo va sumo, ʙaroʙar ast va on iʙorat ast, az in ki cuz Allohro naparastem va hec cizero sariki U nasozem (misli ʙut, saliʙ, toƣut va ƣajra..) va ʙa'ze az mo ʙa'ze digarro ʙa xudoi nagirad. Ej mu'minon agar onon rujgardonand, ʙa ahli kitoʙ ʙigued, sohid ʙosed, ki mo musalmon hastem
